articles.title: Rage with the Machinist Release Notes - News - Lost Ark
articles.description: The September “Rage with the Machinist” Update arrives in Arkesia tomorrow. The Machinist arrives in Arkesia and an old threat also resurfaces in the next Legion Raid; Mayhem Demon Legion Commander Kakul-Saydon. Find the full list of updates here.
articles.content:
Heroes of Arkesia,
The September “Rage with the Machinist” Update arrives in Arkesia tomorrow. Downtime for the update will begin on September 28 at 12AM PT (7AM UTC) and is expected to last 4 hours… [+9495 chars]

articles.title: How Underground Groups Use Stolen Identities and Deepfakes - Trend Micro
articles.description: The growing appearance of deepfake attacks is significantly reshaping the threat landscape. These fakes brings attacks such as business email compromise (BEC) and identity verification bypassing to new levels.
articles.content: These deepfake videos are already being used to cause problems for public figures. Celebrities, high-ranking government officials, well-known corporate figures, and other people who have many high-re… [+6627 chars]

articles.author: Renuka Kumar
articles.title: The same app can pose a bigger security and privacy threat depending on the country where you download it, study finds - The Conversation
articles.description: Mobile apps are sometimes ‘regionalized’ to better serve the needs of users, functioning differently in, for example, China than in Canada. But some of those differences pose security and privacy risks.
articles.content: Google and Apple have removed hundreds of apps from their app stores at the request of governments around the world, creating regional disparities in access to mobile apps at a time when many economi… [+6309 chars]

articles.title: Windows 11 22H2 blocked due to blue screens on some Intel systems - BleepingComputer
articles.description: Microsoft is now blocking the Windows 11 22H2 update from being offered on some systems with Intel Smart Sound Technology (SST) audio drivers.
articles.content:
Microsoft is now blocking the Windows 11 22H2 update from being offered on some systems with Intel Smart Sound Technology (SST) audio drivers.
